name: git-profile
title: Git Profile
description: This extension is for managing Git user profiles.
author: tuki0918

commands.name: current-profile
commands.title: Current User
commands.description: Display and change the current Git profile

commands.name: list-profiles
commands.title: Manage Profiles
commands.description: Manage multiple user profiles for Git

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
